title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Analyze propulsion systems and their performance under various conditions.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Conduct a detailed analysis of combustion processes in jet engines.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design and optimize a nozzle for a jet propulsion system.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: A quiz covering the fundamentals of aerodynamics and flow dynamics.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Perform an in-depth analysis of air and fluid flow over a wing.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Analyze the heating effects on aircraft surfaces during high-speed flight.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a structural component of an aircraft and analyze its performance.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate and analyze orbital trajectories for satellites and spacecraft.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Final exam covering key concepts in systems engineering.
